transcript:
frowning brows stood a hundred paces away from them in his helmet and Horse Guards' jacket, shouting something to a pale, white- uniformed Austrian officer. 
"But that's the Grand Duke, and I want the commander in chief or the Emperor," said Rost6v, and was about to spur his horse. 
"Count! Count!" shouted Berg who ran up from the other side as eager as Boris. "Count! I am wounded in my right hand" (and he showed his bleeding hand with a handkerchief tied round it) "and I remained at the fron
